snippet: A tussle with Google offers a look at the frustrating nature of Web site infections, which are increasingly ubiquitous but hard to diagnose and cure. Dealing with them can cause even the most sensible people to throw up their hands and seek legal...
abstract: A tussle with Google offers a look at the frustrating nature of Web site infections, which are increasingly ubiquitous but hard to diagnose and cure. Dealing with them can cause even the most sensible people to throw up their hands and seek legal action.

headline.main: One Man's Fight With Google Over a Security Warning
